name: Create User on LXC Container
description: Create a user inside the LXC container with specified username, optional uid, and optional gid. If uid/gid are not provided, the system will assign them automatically. Calls create-user.sh with template variables.

commands.description: Create a user inside the LXC container with specified username, optional uid, and optional gid. Calls create-user.sh with template variables.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username to create inside the LXC container. Default is root.

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: Optional: The UID for the user. Default is 0 (root). If not provided, the system will assign one automatically.

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: Optional: The GID for the user. Default is 0 (root). If not provided, the system will assign one automatically.
